options.name: OFF (Game Default)
options.tooltip: - The default, low-fidelity destination backgrounds.

options.name: "Only Upscaled"
options.tooltip:
- "Images were upscaled only." 
 - Pictures processed with Upscaling and intensified values for Color, Vibrance, and Lighting. 
 - Images were upscaled x4 the details of the original game assets, downscaled back to 1440p resolution, and optimized (cleaned up) during the process.

options.name: Colorful
options.tooltip:
- "Images were upscaled AND adjusted to look more colorful and vibrant." 
 - Pictures processed with Upscaling. 
 - Color, vibrance, and lighting were increased where appropriate. 
 - Images were upscaled x4 the details of the original game assets, downscaled back to 1440p resolution, and optimized (cleaned up) during the process.

options.name: Realistic
options.tooltip:
- "Images were upscaled AND adjusted to look closer to real life." 
 - Pictures processed with Upscaling. 
 - Color, vibrance, and lighting were adjusted to more closely resemble reality. 
 - Images were upscaled x4 the details of the original game assets, downscaled back to 1440p resolution, and optimized (cleaned up) during the process.
